txt.en: Ithilien Scrap of an Essence Reclamation Scroll[v]

A scrap of an Essence Reclamation Scroll. Herbalists of Gondor can combine 3 of these into an Essence Reclamation Scroll.\n\nThese may also be traded to Becka Burdock for Festival Scraps of Essence Reclamation Scrolls, a version of the same item available at Festivals. Becka Burdock may be found near the Party Tree in Hobbiton during festivals.
Ithilien Scraps of an Essence Reclamation Scroll[p]
